# Problem: mull-001-corp [Easy]

## Situation
Game start. You're Corp.
ID: Pravdivost Consulting (no special ability, 45 card min, 3 influence). Decide: keep or mulligan?

## Hand (5 cards)
```
[[Hedge Fund]]
[[Ice Wall]]
[[Enigma]]
[[Urtica Cipher]]
[[Offworld Office]]
```


## Card Text (Auto-Generated)

**Enigma** - ICE: Code Gate (Rez 3, Strength 2)
↳ The Runner loses [click].
↳ End the run.

**Hedge Fund** - Operation: Transaction (Cost 5)
Gain 9[credit].

**Ice Wall** - ICE: Barrier (Rez 1, Strength 1)
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
↳ End the run.

**Offworld Office** - Agenda: Expansion (Adv 4, Points 2)
When you score this agenda, gain 7[credit].

**Urtica Cipher** - Asset: Ambush (Rez 0, Trash 2)
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.

## Question
Keep or mulligan this hand?
